Package HelperClasses

Class User

  • java.lang.Object
    • HelperClasses.User
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Admin, Faculty, Student

    public class User
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    The user class for modeling faculty,student and admin objects
    Author:
    Harsh, Nihesh
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        name - name of the user
        password - password of user account
        emailID - emailID of the user
        userType - user type - choices are faculty, admin and student

        lock - locks the server if set to true

      • authenticate

        public boolean authenticate​(java.lang.String password)
        authenticates a user by checking the password typed and the real password of the user in the database during login
        Parameters:
        password - password typed during login
        Returns:
        true if validated false otherwise

      • changePassword

        public boolean changePassword​(java.lang.String oldPassword,
                              java.lang.String newPassword)
        change password of a user
        Parameters:
        oldPassword - the existing password
        newPassword - the new password
        Returns:
        true if successful, false otherwise

      • serialize

        public void serialize​(java.lang.Boolean lock)
        serializes a user back to the server database
        Parameters:
        lock - takes a lock on the server if set to true

      • logout

            throws LoggedOutException
        used to logout a user currently logged in
        Throws:
